resources.string: This is a student community designed to help them build their mobile and web development skills and knowledge. It is open to any student, ranging from novice developers who are just starting, to advanced developers who want to further their skills. It is intended to be a space for students to learn and collaborate as they solve mobile and web development problems. Student from different technical background meet and develop finalized products.
Based on Google Developer Student Club

This Club is totally based on the Developer Student Club Program of Google. Students from various universities can form club in their institutions with different academic background. Click on the below button to read out more about Google program on Developer Student Club.
Functioning in Rajkiya Engineering College, Bijnor

This club is currently functioning in Rajkiya Engineering College Bijnor (Chandpur), Uttar Pradesh. This is a government engineering college which is formerly known as Dr. Bhimrao Ambedkar Engineering College for Information Technology. To know more about this college please visit the website by clicking following button or you can visit https://recb.ac.in .
Join this club for skills development and contribute to your own society in many ways. i.e. by teaching skills to other students,etc.
Don\'t have an account? Create one now!
Alraedy have an account? Sign In here!
Developer Student Club is run by students of Rajkiya Engineering College Bijnor
